thumb.title: TAS Super Mario Bros debug mode in 00 53 53 by lexikiq April Fools
thumb.description: 転載元https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VRsBh0YLugI以下説明文[april fools it's actually mari0's cheats]Super Mario Bros. contains a hidden debug mode with several options that the developers used while testing the game's mechanics, physics, or added from pure boredom. This debug mode's portal gun and gel cannon are believed to have been the inspiration for several mechanics in Valve's Portal series released a little over 24 years later. This TAS enables every debug setting and beats the game in the record-shattering time of 53.53 seconds.---This is a tool assisted speedrun. It has been created by slowing down the games to extremely slow speeds and with save states to create a theoretically perfect run of the game. This is not aiming to compete with regular runs performed by humans.Rerecord count: 557
thumb.last_res_body: ロックマンですら... 乙 まず元ゲー知らねぇ なにがなんだか メーカーの敵大量... こんばんわッス まるで悪魔城の連...

tags.tag: スーパーマリオブラザーズ
